text: 9|120|Sazovor nest, ki ahli Madina va a'roʙ [-i ʙodijanisin] peromuni eson az [hamrohi ʙo] Rasululloh ʙozmonand va hifzi coni xesro muqaddam ʙar u sumorand, zero dar rohi Alloh taolo hec tasnagi va rancu gurusnagie ʙa onon namerasad va dar hec makone, ki kofironro ʙa xasm meovarad, qadam nameguzorand va az dusman hec [sikast va] zarʙae namexurand, magar inki ʙa [podosi] on kori soista ʙarojason saʙt mesavad. Barosti, ki Alloh taolo podosi nakukoronro zoe' namegardonad
